                                                             int finalY)
Generate an intermediate football image for the shooting animation.

Specified by:
generateIntermediateFootballImage in interface comp102x.assignment.GameLogic
Parameters:
depthImages - an array of football images of different depths
initialStep - the initial step of the shooting animation
currentStep - the current step of the shooting animation
finalStep - the final step of the shooting animation
initialScale - the initial scale of the football
finalScale - the final scale of the football
initialX - the initial x position of the football
finalX - the final x position of the football
initialY - the initial y position of the football
finalY - the final y position of the football
Returns:
the selected depth image

updateGoalPositions

public void updateGoalPositions(comp102x.assignment.Goal[][] goals)
Update the positions of the goals

Specified by:
updateGoalPositions in interface comp102x.assignment.GameLogic
Parameters:
a - 2D array of Goal objects that represents the goals displayed on the main game screen The order of preference for moving (and switching) the movable goals is: 1. Vertically up one row 2. Vertically down one row 3. Horizontally left one column 4. Horizontally right one column 5. Diagonally up one row and to the right column 6. Diagonally up one row and to the left column 7. Diagonally down one row and to the right column 8. Diagonally down one row and to the left column

Compare the record of the current game play with those of previous game plays and update the highscore records

Specified by:
updateHighScoreRecords in interface comp102x.assignment.GameLogic
Parameters:
highScoreRecords - represents the 1D array of the GameRecords of PREVIOUS game plays
name - name of the current game play
level - level of the current game play
score - score of the current game play
Returns:
a 1D array of GameRecords after processing the record of the current game play
